alert.note: Alert for Northern Orange; Southern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 25 at 8:00AM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Sabine River Near Deweyville For the Sabine River...including Burkeville, Bon Wier, Deweyville, Orange...flooding is possible. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 400 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Sabine River near Deweyville. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM CST Thursday the stage was 19.6 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Sabine River Deweyville 24.0 19.6 Thu 6 am CST 20.7 22.4 23.8 &&
